solution_line_template: In total Pauline planted {total_tomatoes} + {total_cucumbers} + {num_potatoes} = <<{total_tomatoes}+{total_cucumbers}+{num_potatoes}={total_planted_vegetables}>>{total_planted_vegetables} different vegetables.
The whole garden can be filled up with {num_rows} * {spaces_per_row} = <<{num_rows}*{spaces_per_row}={garden_capacity}>>{garden_capacity} different vegetables.

So Pauline could plant {garden_capacity} - {total_planted_vegetables} = <<{garden_capacity}-{total_planted_vegetables}={more_vegetables_to_plant}>>{more_vegetables_to_plant} more vegetables in her garden.
